items.name: Saiga-12K 12ga オートマチックショットガン
items.description: Saiga-12K ショットガンを改造し、フルオート射撃を可能にしたもの。とんでもない武器だ。

items.name: SOK-12 Chaos Titan Quad Rail handguard
items.description: A lightweight handguard from the Titan Quad Rail System for Saiga shotguns. Manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: Zenit RK-1 tactical foregrip on B-25U mount
items.description: The RK-1 foregrip can be installed on the lower part of handguards with a Weaver rail. It provides better operational control of a weapon during firing. Installed on B-25U mount for easier handling of LMGs. Manufactured by Zenit.

items.name: SOK-12 Chaos Titan Quad Rail handguard top cover
items.description: A handguard top rail for the Titan Quad Rail System, manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: Chaos HK Style front sight
items.description: A front sight modeled after the popular Heckler & Koch iron sights, manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: SOK-12 Chaos Titan receiver top rail
items.description: A receiver top rail for the Titan Quad Rail System, manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: Vortex Razor AMG UH-1 ホログラフィックサイト
items.description: Vortex Razor AMG UH-1 ホログラフィックサイト。近未来的なデザインだけでなく、開発者によればホログラフィックサイトおよびリフレックスサイトの分野における革新的な製品でもあるらしい。

items.name: Chaos HK Style rear sight
items.description: A rear sight modeled after the popular Heckler & Koch iron sights, manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: Tromix Monster Claw 12ga マズルブレーキ
items.description: The Monster Claw muzzle brake from Tromix significantly reduces recoil and can be used for breaking tempered glass.

items.name: AK Custom Arms AGS-74 PRO + Sniper Kit pistol grip
items.description: A lightweight ergonomic pistol grip for AK series weapon systems, features the "Sniper Kit" palm shelf for user comfort and hand rest. Manufactured by Custom Arms.

items.name: SOK-12 Kiba Arms Zombie Custom dust cover
items.description: A receiver dust cover for the SOK-12 shotgun, modernized by Kiba Arms.

items.name: AK-74M/AK-100 Zenit PT Lock
items.description: The lock is designed to install the PT-1 and PT-3 stocks to a weapon. This model is designed for installation on the AK-74M and AK-100-series assault rifles. Manufactured by Zenit.

items.name: AK Zenit PT-3 "Klassika" stock
items.description: The PT-3 telescopic stock is mounted instead of the standard stock of AK-103, 104, 105, 74M, AKS74U, and PP Vityaz weapons. Features a length adjustment mechanism and an adjustable cheek. A special PT lock is required for installation. Manufactured by Zenit.

items.name: SOK-12 12ga MD Arms 20-round drum magazine
items.description: The MD Arms 20-shell drum magazine for SOK-12 and compatible weapons, intended for use with 12/76 or 12/70 shells.

items.name: AK CSS knurled charging handle
items.description: The CSS knurled charging handle gives the user an enhanced oversized knob to operate the weapon more easily. This handle works on all Vepr Rifles and Shotguns, Saiga Rifles and Shotguns, and most AK platform weapons.

670febed5ee0fc738a0965a4.name: Fatal Outcome
670febed5ee0fc738a0965a4.description: ウイルスと感染者全てを殲滅し、"Halloween 2024" のイベントタスクを完了する

items.name: Saiga-12K 12ga オートマチックショットガン
items.description: Saiga-12K ショットガンを改造し、フルオート射撃を可能にしたもの。とんでもない武器だ。

items.name: SOK-12 Chaos Titan Quad Rail handguard
items.description: A lightweight handguard from the Titan Quad Rail System for Saiga shotguns. Manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: Zenit RK-1 tactical foregrip
items.description: The RK-1 foregrip can be installed on the lower part of handguards with a Weaver rail. It provides better operational control of a weapon during firing. Manufactured by Zenit.

items.name: SOK-12 Chaos Titan Quad Rail handguard top cover
items.description: A handguard top rail for the Titan Quad Rail System, manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: Chaos HK Style front sight
items.description: A front sight modeled after the popular Heckler & Koch iron sights, manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: SOK-12 Chaos Titan receiver top rail
items.description: A receiver top rail for the Titan Quad Rail System, manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: EOTech XPS3-0 ホログラフィックサイト
items.description: XPS3 は他のホログラフィックサイトよりコンパクトだが、性能は同等だ。更に、この設計により追加装備のためのマウントスペースが広く取れる。ハンターや軍のオペレーターは、その小型さと軽量さを評価しており、長時間の任務では特にその差が際立つ。モデル 3-0 は 1 MOA のシングルドットレティクルを備えている。

items.name: Chaos HK Style rear sight
items.description: A rear sight modeled after the popular Heckler & Koch iron sights, manufactured by Chaos.

items.name: Tromix Monster Claw 12ga マズルブレーキ
items.description: The Monster Claw muzzle brake from Tromix significantly reduces recoil and can be used for breaking tempered glass.

items.name: AK PUFGUN SG-M2 pistol grip
items.description: The SG-M2 pistol grip for AK and compatible rifles. Manufactured by PUFGUN.

items.name: SOK-12 Kiba Arms Zombie Custom dust cover
items.description: A receiver dust cover for the SOK-12 shotgun, modernized by Kiba Arms.

items.name: AK-74M/AK-100 Zenit PT Lock
items.description: The lock is designed to install the PT-1 and PT-3 stocks to a weapon. This model is designed for installation on the AK-74M and AK-100-series assault rifles. Manufactured by Zenit.

items.name: AK Zenit PT-3 "Klassika" stock
items.description: The PT-3 telescopic stock is mounted instead of the standard stock of AK-103, 104, 105, 74M, AKS74U, and PP Vityaz weapons. Features a length adjustment mechanism and an adjustable cheek. A special PT lock is required for installation. Manufactured by Zenit.
